**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 30 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This white marble staff is carved into the figure of an abstract knight, its shield bearing the symbol of Lastwall, with a wickedly pointed sword made of dark wood raised high above its head. When you wield it as a weapon, it gains the [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) trait and functions as a wooden stake, allowing you to use it to stake vampires, and your Strikes with the staff gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against undead. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Final Rest **Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 30 **Price** 240 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_disrupt undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=79)
  • **1st** [_disrupting weapons_](/Spells.aspx?ID=80), [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
  • **2nd** _heal_, [_gentle repose_](/Spells.aspx?ID=131)
Staff of Final Rest (Greater) **Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 30 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The circumstance bonus to damage rolls is +2.
  • **3rd** [_bind undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=22), _disrupting weapons_, _heal_
  • **4th** _heal_, [_holy cascade_](/Spells.aspx?ID=151)
Staff of Final Rest (Major) **Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 30 **Price** 9,000 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The circumstance bonus to damage rolls is +3.
  • **5th** [_death ward_](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), _disrupting weapons_, _heal_
  • **6th** [_field of life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=114), _heal_, _holy cascade_
  • **7th** _heal_, _holy cascade_, [_sunburst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=326)
name: Staff of Final Rest
